transcript: how can I make this simpler how can I make this shorter how can I make this easier and I really do write to a fifth grader because if you can write to a fifth grader then everyone else will understand but people mistake making things simpler as making them dumber and I think that's a massive mistake that a lot of content creators make specifically within what i' would consider highbrow Industries in the investing world or Finance or even business is that they try and make things sound complicated to make themselves sound smart but all they do is confuse people and then no one listens
